item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. About Google Chrome's "This extension may soon no longer be supported" (73 points | 19 comments)
2. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (438 points | 106 comments)
3. Substance in broccoli, celery inhibits graying of black hair (35 points | 16 comments)
4. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (307 points | 123 comments)
5. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (68 points | 5 comments)
6. Man's brain turned to glass by hot Vesuvius ash cloud (66 points | 16 comments)
7. Solarpunk (357 points | 164 comments)
8. The top 10% owns 87% of the stocks (245 points | 291 comments)
9. Permacomputing (43 points | 9 comments)
10. Harvest the sun twice: Agrivoltaics promises sustainable food, energy and water (56 points | 15 comments)
11. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (197 points | 125 comments)
12. Robust Wavefront OBJ model parsing in C (11 points | 2 comments)
13. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (67 points | 5 comments)
14. ninjavis – generate visualization from ninja build logs (5 points | discuss)
15. BM25 in PostgreSQL (95 points | 18 comments)
16. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (274 points | 74 comments)
17. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (251 points | 60 comments)
18. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (246 points | 185 comments)
19. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (276 points | 105 comments)
20. Blender-made movie Flow takes Oscar (465 points | 70 comments)
21. We in-housed our data labelling (33 points | 16 comments)
22. Begrudgingly Choosing CBOR over MessagePack (44 points | 27 comments)
23. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (169 points | 93 comments)
24. Kaspersky exposes hidden malware on GitHub stealing personal data (139 points | 73 comments)
25. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (218 points | 208 comments)
26. Show HN: Free Kindle Scribe Weekly Planner Creator (10 points | 2 comments)
27. Phlex for Rails Emails: Action Mailer Without ERB (5 points | discuss)
28. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (179 points | 86 comments)
29. A Few of the Birds I Love (50 points | 14 comments)
30. Schools reviving shop class (209 points | 148 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
